Valley wide, Tucson, Sedona, Flagstaff & Various Southwest Locations+

25 Years @ ASU in Technology Support Coordinator Sr. Position. And 50 years as Director of Talent Buying & Promotions, schedule/book/artists for live original singer/songwriter, performances. + Book acts into various venues valley wide, all genre's of music clubs, corporate events, house concerts, retirement facilities, special events; grand openings, corporate functions and assist with recording & production, as well as movie sound track work. Over 40 years of working with artists, solo's, duo's, trio's, 4, 5, 6 piece bands of all genre's.85% working with original artists and up & coming touring Indy bands; NIRVANA, SoundGarden, Soul Asylum, Alex Chilton, Goo Goo Dolls, Afghan Whigs, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Phantom Planet, Guttermouth, Gin Blossom's, The Silo's and many more throughout the years! Complete list, as well as demo archive to go along with in many cases.

The Sun Club; In house Talent Buyer/Booking Agent/Promoter/Co-Mgr. Music Guru!

Funky, musty, sweaty, great live music dive that was rocked by some of the best local & national bands from 87 to 92!! Touring acts; NIRVANA, Meat Puppet's, Honeymoon Killers, Too Much Joy, fIREHOSE, Swallow, Tragic Malatto,many great local bands; The Thang, Dashboard Mary, Feed Bag's, Gin Blossom's, Rain Covention, JFA, etc....Great times, almost killed me!!

Thank You Rick for letting me document the music which I enjoy most of all Sir!
